docs.title: agenet
docs.text: A Python 3.8 implementation of the System Model estimate the average AoI (AAoI) in an ultra-reliable low latency communication (URLLC) enabled wireless  communication system with slotted aloha scheme  over the quasi-static Rayleigh block fading channels. A packet communication scheme is used to meet both the reliability and latency requirements of the  proposed wireless network. By resorting to finite block length information theory, queuing theory and stochastic processes, theoretical results were obtained for this research software.

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
The implementation requires Python 3.8+ to run. The following libraries are also required:

  • numpy
  • matplotlib
  • pandas
  • tabulate
  • argparse
  • itertools
  • math
  • scipy
  • random

docs.title: From source/GitHub
docs.text:
Directly using pip:

pip install

Or each step at a time:

git clone  https://github.com/cahthuranag/agenet.git
cd 
pip install .

docs.title: Installing for development and/or improving the package
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/cahthuranag/agenet.git
cd 
pip install -e .[dev]

This way, the package is installed in development mode. As a result, the pytest dependencies/plugins are also installed.
